org.mongodb.morphia.query

Interface Criteria

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CriteriaContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCriteria, CriteriaContainerImpl, FieldCriteria, GeoFieldCriteria, QueryImpl, WhereCriteria

    public interface Criteria
    Internal class for building up query documents.
